channel.title: Need help adding ints

item.title: Need help adding ints
item.dc:creator: @tb1 tb
item.description:
@tb1 wrote:

Okay im using a battlescape client, and idk how to add some ints. Does anyone know how to tell which goes where?

Regular:

if(i == 13238) //blahblah { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 40222; class8.anInt181 = 1616; class8.anInt190 = 396; class8.anInt198 = 1050; class8.anInt194 = 4; class8.anInt169 = -3; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt165 = 40934; class8.anInt200 = 40934; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "blahblah"; class8.aByteArray178 = "blahblah.".getBytes(); }

Battlescape:

else if (i == 84103) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Weild"; itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.modelZoom = 1300; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 591; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1034; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 8; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 8; itemDef.name = "blahblah"; itemDef.description = "blahblah.".getBytes(); itemDef.modelID = 23233; itemDef.guyModelID = 22787; itemDef.girlModelID = 22787; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[1] = null; }

I cannot tell how to add these items because battlescape uses itemDef, and some other stuff. The kind im use to uses class8, can someone help me out please?

Read full topic
